text: The best brown sugar boba, made fresh daily. Sells out quickly and longs queue for the quality.

(Translated by Google) Tea shop, large selection and very interesting flavors. The store is located between Soho and Chinatown in London.

(Original)
Sklep z herbatą , duży wybór i bardzo ciekawe smaki . Sklep znajduje się pomiędzy Soho i Chinatown w Londynie .
A little surprise on the bottom
A no BS hole in the wall store - which is great. Ordered very quickly and the milk tea was delicious.

Come here for authentic milk and fruit teas.

Their signatures are the best - milk tea with pearls and fruit teas are all winners. Love that the teas are sourced and all the recipes of milk/fruit teas have their unique flavours. 

Never been disappointed with the quality. Definitely recommend!
I like the fact that they have more of the authentic flavours. Wait times can be long though, as they're always busy

(Translated by Google) I ordered Fenyuan milk tea and gave me pure oolong milk tea. And the service attitude is very poor.

(Original)
我点了粉圆奶茶给了我纯乌龙奶茶。而且服务态度非常差。
Amazing taste! But quite pricy for bubble tea I would say. The price has gone up quite a bit since they first opened.

This Yifang doesn’t have the Hot option unlike their Spitalfields one, here they only have Warm which cooled down much too quickly.

Also the pearls were clumped together into a  mass.
